title: Add a New Contact to a Customer Account
description: A new engineer at a customer company needs to be added as a technical contact on their account.

tasks.description: Find the customer's account in the CRM.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the correct customer account.

tasks.description: Add the new contact's name, title, email, and phone number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the new contact's details accurately.

tasks.description: Assign the 'Technical Contact' role to the new person.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sets the role for the new contact, ensuring they receive technical bulletins.
